conversations.body_text:
Hi,

I cant access to the ticket

Cant restore password or able to access to the system, can you assist

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Cihan Efe GURSES,  We apologize for the delay in shipping to our partner. The original estimated date was the 15th, but it has now been adjusted to the 20th. Rest assured, all products are ready and will be shipped as soon as they pass quality inspection.
